Package src.controllers

Class MainController

java.lang.Object
src.controllers.MainController
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, java.io.Serializable
Main controller. Handles the login and loads appropriate user screen based on username input. Controls the initial starting of the application and creating stock user again, if it is deleted.
See Also:
